name: Paint By The Numbers
description:
• Make your way through a silly and comedic adventure as you desperately try to impress your new painting master and become his next apprentice.
  • Travel all over the fascinating land of Tanip in search of crucial art supplies for your daily lesson.
  • Meet and befriend a cavalcade of strange animals, creatures, and gods in your quest to reach the pinnacle of painting perfection.

Newest Update: Can now be played in the browser!
